abstract: Ads about cleaning up birds after oil spills bring scrutiny of Procter & Gamble’s ambivalence toward animals, mixing environmentalism with animal testing.
snippet: Ads about cleaning up birds after oil spills bring scrutiny of Procter & Gamble’s ambivalence toward animals, mixing environmentalism with animal testing.
lead_paragraph: ALTHOUGH cause-related marketing usually entails a company selecting a nonprofit in need of money and exposure, when it comes to Dawn dishwashing liquid, it was not the brand that chose the charity but the other way around.

headline.main: Tough on Crude Oil, Soft on Ducklings
headline.print_headline: Tough on Crude Oil, Soft on Ducklings
